name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Irvin GASS, Appellant

OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
412 A.2d 882
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Irvin GASS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 12, 1980.
Decided April 10, 1980.
Bruce M. Johnson, Meadville, for appellant.
Donald E. Lewis, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
